refnamediv.refpurpose: Get MX records corresponding to a given Internet host name

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Searches DNS for MX records corresponding to hostname. Returns &true; if any records are found; returns &false; if no records were found or if an error occurred.
A list of the MX records found is placed into the array mxhosts. If the weight array is given, it will be filled with the weight information gathered.

note.simpara: This function should not be used for the purposes of address verification. Only the mailexchangers found in DNS are returned, however, according to RFC 2821 when no mail exchangers are listed, hostname itself should be used as the only mail exchanger with a priority of 0.
This function is not implemented on Windows platforms. Try the PEAR class Net_DNS.

refsect1.simpara: See also checkdnsrr, gethostbyname, gethostbynamel, gethostbyaddr, and the named(8) manual page.
